body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to CarMax customer support. My name is Bryan Turner and I am here to assist you. May I know your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Donna. Could you kindly provide me with your phone number so I can better assist you in resolving your issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, triple eight, six two one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Donna. Additionally, could you provide me with the last four digits of your social security number for account verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last four digits of my social security number are seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the necessary information, Donna. Now that we have the required details, how may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am feeling excited because I recently made a purchase from CarMax and it's been a great experience so far!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Donna! If you have any further questions or need assistance in the future, feel free to reach out to us. Thank you for your time today, and have a wonderful day!
